pkgmetadata.longdescription: Presentations in the REPL // Create presentations and display them inside the R 'REPL' (Read-Eval-Print loop), aka the R console. Presentations can be written in 'RMarkdown' or any other text format. A set of convenient navigation options as well as code evaluation during a presentation is provided. It is great for tech talks with live coding examples and tutorials. While this is not a replacement for standard presentation formats, it's old-school looks might just be what sets it apart. This project has been inspired by the 'REPLesent' project for presentations in the 'Scala' 'REPL'.
